title: The 10 Commandments of Draven
body:
Thou shalt have no other ADC but Draven.

Thou shalt not make unto Draven any graven image.

Thou shalt not take the name of the lord Draven thy God in vain.

Thou shalt not commit adultery unless it involves thy lord Draven.

Thou shalt not steal unless it is for thy offering to Draven.

Thou shalt not bear false witness against thy Draven.

Thou shall covet Draven and or Draaaaaaven only.

Remember the Draventh day, to keep it Draven.

Honour thy Draven and thy Draven.

Thou shall kill as long as it's in thy name of thy lord Draven and only if thou do it in style.

replies.body: k, I'll just kick Draven's ass when I'm Zed
